nodes.text: The Palpatine Archive was a class II space station located in the Coruscant system, used by the Galactic Empire to store valuable artwork and artifacts. When attempting to return the Totem of Saglanost back to the Rekk species, Lando Calrissian and Jaxxon stole it from the Palpatine Archive, where the Empire had stored the totem after taking it from Rekkana.
